div.p: FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, SAVING YOU MONEY AGAIN.
YOU KNOW, WE DON’T LIKE TO ENDORSE BIG COMPANIES.
IT’S NOT WHAT WE ARE HERE TO DO. HOWEVER, IF YOU BECOME A PRIME
MEMBER ON AMAZON.COM, YOU GET BIG DISCOUNTS ON EVERYTHING THEY
SELL. IT COSTS $79 A YEAR BUT YOU
DON’T HAVE TO PAY FOR 30 DAYS. UNGD SAFE YOU COULD SAVE MONEY
ON CHRISTMAS STUFF AND PAY LATER.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. CHECK IT OUT.
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR
